channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ID
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ID

item.title: Report E-2023090593
item.description:
Report E-2023090593

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-25T03:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-24
  • City: MERIDIAN
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one of the poly 50 pound bags of Jack's Professional (un1477) had been damaged by a sharp object and had released 1 ounce of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report E-2023090567
item.description:
Report E-2023090567

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-22
  • City: MERIDIAN
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one of the poly 50 pound bag of casco fm-6210 (un1325) had been damaged by a sharp object and had released 10 ounces of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.
